definition: animal reproductive body consisting of an ovum or embryo together with nutritive and protective envelopes, coat with beaten egg
details:
noun
- animal reproductive body consisting of an ovum or embryo together with nutritive and protective envelopes
- one of the two male reproductive glands that produce spermatozoa and secrete androgens
= synonyms: ball
- oval reproductive body of a fowl (especially a hen) used as food
= synonyms: eggs
verb
- coat with beaten egg
= example: coat with beaten egg
- throw eggs at
